settings.editor: We have a number of drone options depending on your circumstances. We also have various other equipment such as handheld steadicam rigs, DSLR's, lenses and lights to accompany your aerial video and photography requirements should you need them.
The Freefly Star8 multi-rotor unpacks, ready to shoot, in under 5 minutes. It is easy to fly in our hands, powerful, rigid, adaptable and reliable, and is a UAV optimized for up to 15-pound payloads.
